I don't believe that I train the animals to do a certain trick or stunt. Instead, I teach the animals to perform on stage by allowing them to show off their individual personalities and talents, Gregory Popovich said. The World Famous Gregory Popovich Comedy Pet Theater has been written up in People magazine, lauded by The New York Times and seen on David Letterman and Jay Leno .
